CLAN.admin.command.setting.name.success.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den Namen des Clans [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) erfolgreich auf [blue][new_name]#[tagline]</color> geändert.</color>
CLAN.admin.command.setting.name.success.en-US: [grey]You have successfully changed the name of the clan[blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) to [blue][new_name]#[tagline].</color></color>

CLAN.admin.command.setting.description.s.de-DE: [grey]Du hast die Beschreibung des Clans [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) erfolgreich auf [blue]"[new_description]"</color> geändert.</color>
CLAN.admin.command.setting.description.s.en-US: [grey]You have successfully changed the description of the clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) to [blue]"[new_description]"</color>.</color>

CLAN.admin.command.setting.tagline.succe.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den Tagline des Clans [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) erfolgreich auf [blue][new_tagline]</color> geändert.</color>
CLAN.admin.command.setting.tagline.succe.en-US: [grey]You have successfully changed the tagline of the clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) to [blue][new_tagline]</color>.</color>

CLAN.admin.command.setting.tag.success.de-DE: [grey]Du hast den Tag des Clans [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) erfolgreich auf [blue][new_tag]</color> geändert.</color>
CLAN.admin.command.setting.tag.success.en-US: [grey]You have successfully changed the tag of the clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) to [blue][new_tag]</color>.</color>

CLAN.admin.command.join.error.already.in.de-DE: [grey]Du bist bereits in einem anderen Clan.</color>

CLAN.admin.command.setrole.success.de-DE: [grey]Du hast dem Spieler [blue][player]</color> die Rolle [blue][role]</color> gegeben.</color>
CLAN.admin.command.setrole.success.en-US: [grey]You have given the player [blue][player]</color> the role [blue][role]</color>.</color>

CLAN.admin.command.setrole.error.not.fou.de-DE: [grey]Die Rolle [red][role]</color> ist ungültig! Gültige Rollen sind: [blue]admin, member</color></color>
CLAN.admin.command.setrole.error.not.fou.en-US: [grey]The role [red][role]</color> is invalid! Valid roles are: [blue]admin, member</color></color>

CLAN.admin.command.setrole.error.owner.de-DE: [grey]Du kannst die Rolle vom [blue]Clan Owner</color> nicht ändern!</color>
CLAN.admin.command.setrole.error.owner.en-US: [grey]You cannot change the role of the [blue]clan owner!</color></color>

CLAN.admin.command.setowner.success.de-DE: [grey]Du hast [blue][player]</color> erfolgreich zum neuen Besitzer des Clans [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) gemacht.</color>
CLAN.admin.command.setowner.success.en-US: [grey]You have successfully made [blue][player]</color> the new owner of the clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>).</color>

CLAN.admin.error.player.not.in.clan.en-US: [grey]The player [blue][player]</color> is not in the clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>).</color>
